name: You need to post information to the court (SOLE AND JOINT)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((first name)) ((last name)),

You ((joint conditional order??or your ))((husbandJoint??husband))((wifeJoint??wife))((civilPartnerJoint??civil partner)) need to post the documents requested by the court to the following address:

Courts and Tribunals Service Centre
HMCTS Divorce and Dissolution service
PO Box 13226
Harlow
CM20 9UG

^Make sure you include your case number: ((reference number)). 

Your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership)) cannot continue until you have provided the information to the court.  

If you need to know which documents to post in, then sign in to your account: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution 
HM Courts & Tribunals Service 
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm) 

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Action required: your ((isDivorce??divorce application))((isDissolution??application to end your civil partnership))
